Stories: As a customer, I want to open a RD account, So that I can start saving
As a RD holder, I want to select a nominee, So that I can let bank know my nominee details
As a RD holder, I want to view current balance, So that I can know my savings
As a banker, I want to deduct monthly amount from customer account, So that I can invest towards customer's RD account
As a banker, I want to view summaries of RD, So that I can let customer know when asked
As a RD holder, I want to receive statements on certain frequency, So that I can know how my investments have grown
As a RD holder, I want to choose option of account, So that I can have Bank deposit my maturity amount to such account
As a customer, I want to open a FD account, So that I can start saving
As a FD holder, I want to select a nominee, So that I can let bank know my nominee details
As a FD holder, I want to view current balance, So that I can know my savings
As a banker, I want to deduct annually from customer account, So that I can invest towards customer's FD account
As a banker, I want to view summaries of FD, So that I can let customer know when asked
As a FD holder, I want to receive statements on certain frequency, So that I can know how my investments have grown
As a FD holder, I want to choose option of account, So that I can have bank deposit such maturity amount to such account
As a customer, I want to open a savings account, So that I can start saving
As a account holder, I want to select a nominee, So that I can let bank know my nominee details for savings account
As a savings account holder, I want to view current balance, So that I can know my savings
As a banker, I want to view summaries of savings account, So that I can print it and share with customer
As a savings account holder, I want to receive statements on certain frequency, So that I can know how my investments have grown
As a account holder, I want to check eligibility of personal loan, So that I can apply
As a account holder, I want to update my contact details, So that banks can call me to process my personal loan request
As a account holder, I want to upload documents online, So that bank can decide to sanction the personal loan amount requested
As a banker, I want to review uploaded documents, So that I can decide if I can sanction the quantum of personal loan requested
As a account holder, I want to view my personal loan statement, So that I can know my due amount
As a account holder, I want to receive statements on a frequency, So that I have a history of payments on personal loan
As a account holder, I want to change amount of monthly EMI Debit, So that I can prepay and close my personal loan early

As a account holder, I want to receive statements on a frequency, So that I have a history of payments on vehicle loan
